title: DeepStockXAI – Stock Trend Forecasting with Explainability
description: Used LSTM and Transformer models to predict short-term stock price trends, integrating SHAP values for explainability, all visualized in a Streamlit dashboard.

title: Sentiment-Based Playlist Recommender
description: Recommended personalized Spotify playlists using blog or tweet sentiment, TF-IDF similarity on song comments, and Spotify feature matching.

title: Apple Financial Chatbot using LangChain
description: Developed an RAG-powered chatbot to answer questions from Apple’s 10-K filings and scraped financial news using BeautifulSoup with 85% accuracy.

title: Monte Carlo Stock Simulator
description: Streamlit app for simulating future stock prices using Brownian motion and Monte Carlo simulations with adjustable inputs.

title: Power Outage Classification with Fairness
description: Classified outage causes using machine learning, while evaluating fairness across groups with permutation tests and total variation distance.
